entry.title: ‘Bear Markets Are Good’ for Cleaning House: Messari CEO
entry.summary: Ryan Selkis says regulators should be a part of the crypto conversation.

entry.title: Going Public ‘Put Us On the Main Stage’: Coinbase CEO
entry.summary: Brian Armstrong, head of the largest U.S. cryptocurrency exchange, says he feels called to defend the industry.

entry.title: SEC ‘Out to Damage Or Destroy’ Crypto Industry: LBRY CEO
entry.summary: Jeremy Kauffman expressed contempt for the SEC as its lawsuit with the regulator reaches a critical point.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Outrage as SEC Claims All Ethereum Transactions Happen in USA
entry.summary: As ETH dropped and the SEC loomed, the NFT community celebrated the first International NFT Day on Tuesday.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Iris Energy to Sell $100 Million in Equity to B. Riley
entry.summary: It's the investment bank's second $100 million investment in a Bitcoin mining company this summer, despite the crypto bear market.

entry.title: How Uniswap Is Taking Aim at Coinbase and Binance
entry.summary: Uniswap wants to "bring your digital asset experience into one place." Uniswap Diamond, and the acquisition of NFT aggregator Genie, will help.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Ethereum Takes Another Week of Losses, XRP Soars
entry.summary: ETH is down 19% since the merge. XRP ballooned this week when news broke that the SEC's lawsuit against Ripple may soon come to a conclusion.

entry.title: Was the Ethereum Merge a Mistake?
entry.summary: The merge has inflicted chaos upon Ethereum—was it all worth it? Some Ethereum loyalists aren’t so sure

entry.title: NFL All Day NFT Sales Surge on Sundays During Football Games
entry.summary: Dapper’s official NFL platform has topped the NFT charts lately, thanks to rising activity on days when real-world games are played.

entry.title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin 'Very Hopeful' Dogecoin Moves to Proof of Stake
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin said that all blockchains, including Dogecoin and Zcash, looking to scale should move to proof of stake.

entry.title: NFTs Will Spawn the Next Marvel or Disney, Says Solana Founder
entry.summary: Solana's Anatoly Yakovenko believes a juggernaut IP could emerge from the current crop of NFT projects.

entry.title: CFTC Sues a DAO, Raising Legal Questions for DeFi Founders and Users
entry.summary: Legal experts say the CFTC's action against the founders of bZx and Ooki DAO could have far-reaching implications for the DeFi industry.

entry.title: XRP Jumps 44% in a Week After Ripple Moves to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Both the SEC and Ripple have filed motions for summary judgment, each asking the judge to rule in their favor without a trial.

entry.title: DARPA Is Bankrolling Research Into Crypto and National Security
entry.summary: Inca Digital just landed a contract with government defense agency DARPA to “visualize how digital assets implicate national security.”

entry.title: Meet 'Funky Crypto Finance Lab' UMA Protocol
entry.summary: Hart Lambur, founder of DeFi project UMA Protocol, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 all about what UMA does and what they have in store for the next iteration of their oracle, and how to write decentralized financial contracts.

entry.title: 'Blockchain Revolution' Author Alex Tapscott at Mainnet 2022: Big Companies Are Warming to Public Blockchains
entry.summary: Alex Tapscott, co-author of the 2018 crypto book "Blockchain Revolution," talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how big companies that in the past thought crypto wasn't "ready for primetime" are now more willing to invest in public blockchains. At the same time, he warns, "I don't want to overstate the culture shift too much."

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Data Center Firm Compute North Files For Bankruptcy
entry.summary: Compute North provides data centers for crypto mining giants such as Compass Mining and Marathon Digital, and owes some $500 million to 200 creditors.

entry.title: Harmony Publishes Revamped Horizon Bridge Recovery Plan
entry.summary: The proposed plan involves deploying Harmony’s treasury towards both recovery of the assets and development of the protocol.

entry.title: Gaming Tokens GODS, APE Up Double-Digits Over The Week
entry.summary: Despite market-wide bearish sentiment, gaming and metaverse-related tokens including GODS and APE have posted significant weekly gains.

entry.title: United Kingdom Introduces Bill to Make Crypto Seizures ‘Easier and Quicker’
entry.summary: The Economic Crime and Corporate Transparency bill modernizes existing legislation to counter new forms of money laundering and cyber crime.

entry.title: IRS Targets Crypto Tax Evaders With M.Y. Safra Bank Summons Over SFOX Data
entry.summary: A New York court has granted the IRS permission to serve a 'John Doe' summons on a bank that provided services for SFOX customers.

entry.title: Cardano Blockchain Moves Forward With Vasil Upgrade
entry.summary: The popular smart contract platform will soon see accelerated transaction times.

entry.title: Coinbase Rejects Proprietary Trading and Crypto ‘Market Maker’ Allegations
entry.summary: The crypto exchange denies reports of a recent $100 million test trade that could be seen as “prop trading.”

entry.title: Helium Founder Explains Why the Crypto Wireless Network Is Moving to Solana
entry.summary: It’s official: Helium is migrating to Solana following a vote. Nova Labs CEO Amir Haleem explains why Helium needed to make the change.

entry.title: Coinbase Policy Chief Kara Calvert Talks SEC Enforcement at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Kara Calvert, Head of U.S. Policy at Coinbase, talks with Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about the proposed legislation she's tracking, how Coinbase is navigating regulation, and wanting to see a replacement for the SEC's Howey Test.

entry.title: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis Talks Bear Market, DeFi, and SEC at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts to kick off our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022. He talked SEC Chair Gary Gensler and regulatory enforcement, DeFi growth and building during a bear market, the Ethereum merge, and had a message for the folks at home.

entry.title: Solana Founder Anatoly Yakovenko Talks Saga Phone, Helium, and ETH Merge at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Solana founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 and talked up Helium's move to Solana, the Solana Saga Android phone, and even gave his take on the Ethereum merge.

entry.title: Uniswap's Big Plans for Taking on Binance and Coinbase: COO Mary-Catherine Lader at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Uniswap Labs COO Mary-Catherine Lader joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 and talked about how the leading DEX is expanding into new areas and taking on big exchanges like Binance and Coinbase.

entry.title: LBRY CEO Jeremy Kauffman at Mainnet 2022: We've Been Fighting the SEC for 5 Years
entry.summary: Jeremy Kauffman, whose decentralized video sharing platform LBRY is involved in a securities lawsuit with the SEC, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz what will happen next, and why he's running for office in New Hampshire, in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022.

entry.title: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer at Mainnet 2022: 'Cambrian Explosion' Coming for NFT Use Cases
entry.summary: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about reasons for optimism despite the NFT market cooling down, adding support for NFTs on more blockchains, and his excitement around NFTs for gaming.

entry.title: NFT Software Company Chain Inks Four-Year Deal With New England Patriots
entry.summary: The deal with Kraft Group makes Chain the official "blockchain and Web3 sponsor" of the Patriots, New England Revolution, Gillette Stadium, and Patriot Place.

entry.title: Ethereum Coin Mixer Tornado Cash Is Back on GitHub
entry.summary: GitHub pulled the tool’s code from its website within hours of the Treasury's ban last month. The code-sharing platform has now apparently rescinded its ban.

entry.title: Ethereum Token Issuance Plummets 95% Following Merge
entry.summary: The ultrasound money meme is taking life, with Ethereum’s daily token issuance dropping following the network upgrade.

entry.title: Remember Starting Lineup NBA Action Figures? They’re Back—With NFTs
entry.summary: Nostalgia alert! LeBron James, Stephen Curry, and others get the Starting Lineup treatment with $50 toys that include NFT cards.

entry.title: Binance Taps Former Obama Advisor for New Global Advisory Board
entry.summary: Former US Senator Max Baucus will chair the Board, which also includes a former Obama advisor and policy experts from around the world.

entry.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon: Crypto Tokens, Bitcoin Are 'Decentralized Ponzi Schemes'
entry.summary: On previous occasions, Dimon has described JPMorgan as being 'at the forefront' of DeFi and blockchain, and said that Bitcoin is 'worthless.'

entry.title: Zilliqa to Launch Web3 Games Console In Early 2023
entry.summary: The blockchain network has unveiled a prototype of its games console, which aims to 'hide the complexity of Web3 from the end-user.'

entry.title: DeFi Bug Bounty Platform Immunefi Raises $24M in Series A
entry.summary: Immunefi plans to use the fresh funding to build a new version of its platform and to increase reward payouts for ethical hackers.

entry.title: Helium Community Approves Crypto Wireless Network's Migration to Solana
entry.summary: Decentralized wireless network Helium has voted to ditch its own blockchain in favor of a move to Solana's network.

entry.title: DeFi Tokens Defy the Dip as Ethereum Slips Below $1,300
entry.summary: Running counter to the broader crypto market’s bearish price action, DeFi tokens have posted gains over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Binance CEO: Bitcoin Bear Market Is 'Healthy' for Crypto Industry Long Term
entry.summary: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao told the crowd at the Mainnet conference to “ride out the winter.”

entry.title: Draft EU Law Could See NFTs Regulated as Securities: Law Prof
entry.summary: Crypto law commentator Brian Fyre interprets the draft bill as treating blue-chip NFT PFP collections like Bored Apes as securities.

entry.title: Ethereum NFTs Are Driving Crypto Adoption in Central and South Asia: Report
entry.summary: Of all the crypto-related web traffic in the region, more than half of it is going to NFT sites.

entry.title: Kraken CEO Jesse Powell Steps Down to Focus on Crypto ‘Industry Advocacy’
entry.summary: Jesse Powell is stepping down from his role as CEO of Kraken, citing the drain of managing operations and how the role had become “less fun.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Dips as Fed Again Raises Interest Rates to Combat Inflation
entry.summary: Volatility hits the crypto market as the Fed raises interest rates by 75 basis points, meeting market expectations.

entry.title: Australia’s Financial Watchdog Expands Team to Better Regulate Crypto
entry.summary: After last week's merge event, Australia's financial regulator ASIC is also weighing whether to classify Ethereum as a financial product.

entry.title: Hacker Saves Abritrum From Ethereum-Draining Bug in Nitro Upgrade
entry.summary: A bug in the latest upgrade for Arbitrum, an Ethereum scaling network, had been live for almost three weeks, but had not yet been exploited.

entry.title: gm: Inside NFT Unicorn Magic Eden With CEO Jack Lu
entry.summary: Magic Eden launched 1 year ago and already has a $1.6 billion valuation. It started as a marketplace only for Solana NFTs, but now it’s opening up to Ethereum. Co-founder and CEO Jack Lu tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about the company’s goals, his take on NFT backlash, Solana vs Ethereum, and the Ethereum merge and its impact on NFTs. Watch and subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Binance and FTX Lead $50M Race to Purchase Voyager's Assets: Report
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchanges Binance and FTX have reportedly made the leading bids for the assets of bankrupt crypto lender Voyager Digital.

entry.title: BNV CEO Richard Hobbs on Creating a Fashion-First Metaverse
entry.summary: Web3 fashion startup BNV is building out its own metaverse to better fit the fashion world than the "voxelated" worlds of Sandbox and Decentraland. BNV CEO Richard Hobbs spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz about why it's necessary, ahead of BNV's special event during Paris Fashion Week.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 2: Who Cares About the Ethereum Merge?
entry.summary: The Ethereum merge will happen this week. In this serving of Decrypt-O's, Kate Irwin explains the Bellatrix upgrade and the shadow fork, Dan Roberts predicts the impact Ethereum's move to proof of stake will have on Bitcoin's energy use PR problem (plus commentary from Dan Held from the gm podcast), and Sander Lutz hits the street in Hollyweird to ask regular folks if they know and care about the merge. (Production by Zack Edelman, editing by Jason Nelson.)

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: The Ethereum Merge
entry.summary: The Ethereum Merge to Proof of Stake (PoS) is one of the most significant technological upgrades in recent history. But why evolve Ethereum at all? Learn the difference between PoW and PoS, why PoS will decrease Ethereum’s carbon footprint by 99.95%, and more in the Infura Web3 Dev Series: The Merge Explained. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs
entry.summary: The years-anticipated Ethereum Merge is less than a week away. Everyone is buzzing about what it will mean for the crypto market and for proof of work vs proof of stake, but what will the effect be on NFTs? Dan Roberts, Andrew Hayward, Kate Irwin and Sander Lutz break it down in our latest live roundtable.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 1: Tornado Cash Privacy Fears, Bored Ape VMAs Hate, Sheriff Gensler
entry.summary: Eat your Decrypt-O’s! In the debut episode, Sander Lutz hits the street to ask people about their privacy concerns in the wake of the government’s Tornado Cash crackdown; Kate Irwin shares headlines on the wackiest Web3 stories, from Crypto.com sending a woman $10 million by accident to Eminem and Snoop Dogg getting Twitter hate for their Bored Apes; and Dan Roberts serves up a rant about Gary Gensler. (Production and editing by Zack Edelman.)

entry.title: gm: Bitcoiner Dan Held Talks Ethereum Merge, PoW vs PoS, and NFTs
entry.summary: Dan Held is an old-school Bitcoiner who has been in the space since the very beginning; he sold his price app ZeroBlock to Blockchain.info in 2013. But while he's largely seen as a Bitcoin maximalist by his half a million fans on Twitter, he tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott he's a "permissive" and "open-minded" Bitcoiner: he's watching the Ethereum Merge closely, and he admits Ethereum's move to proof of stake will put pressure on Bitcoin's energy use. Watch Episode 18 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Ethereum Merge Is on the Horizon
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.

entry.title: VCs and Family Offices Go Crypto: Hashed, Lux, Cleo, RW3 and Protofund at Crypto Bahamas
entry.summary: Baek Kim of Hashed, Grace Isford of Lux Capital, Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital, Peter Najarian of RW3 Ventures, and Edward Moncada of Protofund talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at FTX's Crypto Bahamas event about VCs and family offices allocating money into crypto and the outlook for institutional DeFi.

entry.title: From Silk Road to Buying ETH: How Musician Tycho Went Crypto
entry.summary: Scott Hansen aka Tycho, the musician, producer, and songwriter, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin how he caught the crypto bug and why he believes Web3 can change the music industry for the better.
